text:
Is anyone having issues with HubSpot API this morning...? I have 2 buttons which make different API calls to the workflow endpoint, enrolling a contact. Everything is logging through my private app correctly, no error responses, all OK statuses and endpoints correct, but the contact is just not being enrolled. Was working totally fine yesterday...

9.17am operations work perfectly, contact enrolled, lovely stuff.
9.29am operations do not work for workflow enrolment. nothing noted in the workflow, all trace/logs point to it being successful. my code logs to console based on success/error and has logged success... :(
is re-enrollment enabled on the WF?
It is! I've got it as manual enrolment only, but it is turned on.
so the private app logs shows a successful response while on the WF tool there's no trace of any log of that enrollment right? that's strage, it could be a bug HubSpot side

Yes that's what it seems! I'm just double checking everything here to make sure i'm not having a moment. I'll raise a support ticket if needs be, or report back shortly here if i've discovered the issue

Embarrassed to admit, I had accidentally updated the workflow ID somewhere else in my project where this was being referred to... All is well, it was just enrolling into a workflow I wasn't expecting... :flushed:

:wave: Hi everyone!

I’m a new HubSpot developer, or at least aspiring to become one. I have a question regarding a project we’re currently working on. We downloaded a theme from the Marketplace that comes with pre-built modules. We’re planning to modify the colors and other elements for our website, and we also want to rebrand some of the theme’s modules to use for other clients’ websites.

What are the best practices for doing this?
or if there a good tutorial, will be helpful!


I would greatly appreciate your help. Thanks!

Hey guys, doing some research and curious to hear how many cold emails people actually receive each month. 

Everybody tells me "hundreds a week" and that's probably way over exaggerated, but I'm trying to understand the market better for this tool that I'm working on to grade emails by relevancy and importance to a company
highly recommend building off the “CMS Boilerplate” theme. Here is a great ’getting started tutorial: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-local-development>

how do I route delivery of a form submission to a specific user, and only that user? I’ve not sucessfully delivered a form to anyone other than the default recipient using notifications_override_email_addresses.

Hey folks. At HG Insights we are working in a integration with HubSpot and we faced some issue that we didn't find the answers in the docs. How can I clean a property value using the Import API? I've tried "", " ", "#N/A", null and none of them worked. Could some help me?

Hey folks! If you're planning on joining us at INBOUND this year, join us to connect with your peers, and be in the right place when we're ready to share any announcements at <#C072R3E9FM4|inbound24> :slightly_smiling_face:
Hey all, does anyone know why sometimes HubSpot sends time over to apps in seconds and sometimes in milliseconds? Anyway to change this?
Awesome -- thanks so much! Very exciting :slightly_smiling_face:

this can change depending on if the property in question has `fieldType` set to `date` vs `datetime`

`datetime` date pickers can only be created via the API. so if you created a property of type "Date picker" in HubSpot, it probably has `fieldType` set to `date` and you won't get milisecond precision since it's only storing dates

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
